1.content:
First things first we need to figure out what story line you want to have.

1. Is john only a child when he discovers/makes the device
2. Is he an adult when it happens
3. If so does he have a family of his own
1.title: Who is john

choices: Put it in his pocket for now, he wants to keep playing
11.content:
John is playing outside in his back yard with his 7 year old sister Sarah his mom is inside watching tv in her room 8 months pregnant with the twins.
"I have to go potty" said Sarah as she walked inside. As she left john spotted something near his fence, it looked like an iPod laying on the ground with the words 'transformation complete' on the screen. John wasnt sure what that meant but there were a bunch of ideas going through his head of what it could be amd what he could do if what was on the screen was actually true.

What does john do with the device?
11.title: The discovery

choices: He uses it on himself while Becky's gone
He uses it on Sarah while Becky's gone
111.content:
John slipped the device in his pocket as his sister came back outside to play. They played for a little while when their mother picked her head out of the door.
"Kids Becky will be coming over to watch you while me and your dad leave for a bit" she yelled out to the two. They ran inside and saw Becky standing at the door waving off their parents and close the door.
"So you kids ready for another fun night with me?" She said as she held up a board game she like to play with them. Both kids ran up and were exited to have their favorite babysitter over. She set the board game up and they played for a little while until becky had to go to the bathroom. John felt the device in his pocket and thought about what to do...
111.title: Later use

choices: John tries to get closer and climb her
112.content:
John hit the red down arrow and suddenly he felt a wierd feeling in his stomach similar to when he's going down in an elevator. When the feeling stops he looks around and the grass he was around looks massive compared to him he's not sure what to do he looks at the device in his hand and it shows what looks like a timer counting down from one hour, he puts it in his pocket and thinks about what to do when he suddenly feels the earth around him shakeing.
"John? Where'd you go?" Sarah called out as she got closer to where john was standing, as he looked up he could see her top half from below tne grass amd she looked like she could grab the moon from the sky at that size.
112.title: Shrinking

choices: He was stuck to Sarah's foot
He was flung away when sarah started running
1121.content:
As Sarah takes another step looking for her brother she's confused where he went.
"He was out here when I went potty" she said to herself mostly.
"Sarah! Do you want to come with me to do some shopping?" Her mom yelled from inside.
"Ya!" Sarah said as she ran back inside.
"Get yoir socks and shoes on and we'll get going" her mom said as she grabbed her keys out of her purse "your dad will watch john while we're gone"

Where is john?
1121.title: One step forward

11211.content:
As Sarah turned to run back inside john felt himself lift up with her foot and slam back down into the dirt, it was painful but otherwise he didn't have a scratch on him he could kind of hear what was going on in the conversation above but couldn't make anything out. He felt sarah turn again and go upstairs to her room but didnt know what she was doing, thats when he saw the ground get further away from him and a sock move between and sarahs foot slid into the sock.

Sarah ran up to her room and grabbed a pair of socks and slipped them onto her foot then ran back downstairs and put her shoes on.
"Ready!"
"Alright let's get going then" Amanda said as they went to the car and got in.
11211.title: Pounding motions

11213.content:
The speed Sarah turned caused John to be flung away and into the neighbors back porch. He could see the door was open enough for him to easily get inside and as he entered the house he noticed this was ______'s house.

Grace Thompson- 7. John and Sarah's friend. She likes to play with small toys and hide them around the house, often forgetting where she hid them. Likes to run around barefoot. Has a 16 year older sister that grace likes to hide her toys in the room of.

Kim Michaels- 13. Likes to tease and mess with the other kids and play pranks on them. Has entered puberty and started "experimenting".
11213.title: Homerun

1123.content: John made a mad dash for his sister and started climbing up her foot, he was glad she was standing in place or else this would be much harder for him. As he got to her ankle she started to walk and john was almost flung off but held on with all his might and continued climbing up her leg. John looked to see were she was going and saw she was heading inside, as she walked in she went for the stairs, probably going to her room to play with dolls. John was half way up to her knee as she took the first step up them and...
1123.title: The moving mountain

choices: He makes it before the vacuum starts
Before he gets there, it roars to life
11231.content:
John was flung off and landed somewhere on the carpet, he saw his massive sister pass over him, completely unaware of his presence, as she went to her room. John stood up and thought the best thing to do was to get her attention for help, not knowing how the device works yet, and started making his way to her room. He tracked through the thick carpet of his home and saw that it was quite dirty
"Mom must not have vacuumed-" he was cut of by the sounds of something openning and truned to see his mom pulling the vacuum out of the hallway closet. He started to run he had to get his sisters attention before his mom sucked him up with out realizing it. He kept looking over at her as his mom unraveled the cord and went to plug it in, he was almost there just a little farther and he would be in his sisters room amd be able to get her help.
11231.title: Carpet landing

113.content:
When he hits the button a small keypad flips out on the device and he thinks about what to type. As he's thinking Sarah comes back outside.
"What's that?" She asked as she grabbed a ball.
"Some sort of cool toy, I think i can turn into stuff with it and shrink" John said as he turned towards Sarah holding out the device " I just dont know what i should try being yet. Do you have any ideas?"
"Hmm oh maybe you try becomeing a piece of clothing then me or mommy can wear you"
"That could be fun but what would I become?"
"You could be come a ballet flat for me to wear to my ballet class tomorrow"
"Gross i dont want to go to ballet"
"Maybe you could become some food"
"Hmm if i do your not aloud to eat me"
"Oh you could also be something that belongs to mommy or daddy and i could hide you in their room"

What does john become first?
113.title: Transformation

1131.content: John ultimately decided to turn himself into something for Sarah...but what exactly does he become?
1131.title: Something for Sarah

choices: Sarah doesn't remeber John and Becky leaves with him
Sarah doesn't remeber John but wants to show Becky the device
11311.content:
"Alright I'm going to become a stick of gum but you have to promise to keep me safe" john said as he typed on the device.
"Ok!" Sarah said excited for the transformation. John pointed the device at himself and fired. The beam felt warm and strangely comforting as he dropped to the floor nothing more then a small stick of gum, his clothes now the tin wrapper around his sweet and chewy body. The device fell with a quiet thud on the grass and Sarah picked both it and her former brother up with it and headed inside. She put the device in her room in her jewellery box filled with the rings of eaten ring pops and other small accessories and walked back out to the kitchen where her mom was on the phone with someone.
"Yep it'll just her tonight, john will be over at a friend's" Amanda said as Sarah walked in carrying John in her hand and sitting at the table and started to draw johns new form with a happy face and dancing. Amanda hung up the phone shortly after and turned to the table and saw Sarah coloring. "Hey sweetie did John leave already?" Without thinking or looking up sarah responded
"Ya who were you talking to mommy?"
"That was the babysitter she'll be watching you while me and your father go to the hospital to check on your new siblings" Amanda said as she rubbed her belly for emphasis and finished getting ready. As she headed back down stairs the doorbell rang and David answered the door.
"Hey Becky thanks for watching Sarah" he said as he grabbed his keys.
"No problem, besides pretty soon I'll be watching two more little goobers" she said as she walked in and motioned to Amanda's stomach. David and Amanda got in their car and drove off as Amanda waved and turned to face Sarah. "Alright whats on the agenda for today kiddo"
"Look I drew John" sarah said as she showed her picture of dancing gum.
"That's very good I love your creativity" Becky said as she looked at the picture. "Well do you want to draw together? We can see whos better" she said as she walked into the kitchen.
"I'll get more paper" Sarah said as she ran off to her room. Becky sat down at the table and noticed the gum.
"Oh gum" she said as she grabbed it "spearmint my favorite" Becky said as she opened the foil and popped it into her mouth and through the wrapper in the garbage. Sarah came back with a stack off paper and the two started coloring as becky chewed on the gum, Sarah completely forgetting about her brother for the moment.

Becky Grant
Age: 18
Wears long sleeve shirts, skirts with stockings and flats. Is a tutor and a babysitter. In her last year of high school. Loves kids. Doesn't like bugs but won't kill them.
11311.title: Sticked

choices: John goes to his parents house
John tests it right now he cant wait
John goes to the high school
12.content: John was in his studio apartment working on his secret project by himself like had been the past few months, he finally finished his shrinking device. He thought about where to use the device first, he could use it here in his apartment but that could be dangerous if something went wrong as there would be noone to help him. Then he thought about taking it to his parents house and using it there as he could have plenty of things to test there and might even be able to get one of their help, intentional or otherwise. He could also go out to the local park or the high school there would be plenty of test subjects there.
12.title: No family of his own

124.content:
John, wanting to find plenty of ways to test his device, walks to the park near his house. When he gets there he can see it separated into a few main parts.
There's the main park with some little kids around 5-10 playing on different things and their parents sitting and talking with each other nearby on some benches.
There's an empty field with a few people walking on a path and a few people having picnics with family or dates.
And there's a water park area with some simple sprinklers and fountains with some kids playing in the water.

Where does john go?
124.title: Nice day for the park

125.content:
John thought about it and thought about maybe using it at one of his neighbors houses.
There's:
The smiths-
Harry- father. In his 40s.
Susan- mother. In her 30s
Kaylie- oldest daughter. 18
Jessie- daughter. 10
Rose- youngest daughter. 2
Tina- family dog. French bulldog
John got along well with the family and has even baby sat a couple of times.

The Cooper's-
Rachel- mother. Mid 30s
Jack- son. 14
Jane- daughter. 14
John didn't knew the coopers very well as they had just recently moved in.

The new young couple-
John didnt know anything about the young couple that moved in across the street last week, but he knew the women seemed to be in her early to mid 20s and the man looked about the same. He noticed that the women looked about 2-3 months pregnant.
125.title: Other locations

1252.content: As john thought he remembered that Rachel Cooper had invited him over to talk about babysitting her kids when she went out. John headed over and knocked on the door seeing Rachel open it wearing jeans and a blouse as she let him inside. They sat down on the couch and arranged good times John could babysit since he was cheaper then hiring someone else. After they talked she asked if he could babysit tonight which john agreed to, planning on testing the device. After a short while she headed out and left john with her fraternal twins, Jack and Jane, John introduced himself and thought about what to do...
1252.title: The Cooper's

choices: John in the morning runs experiments
Christie tests it out as she wakes up before him
Charlie either accidentally uses it on herself or one of her parents
13.content:
John just finished his latest invention, a device that will allow him to condense matter and turn it into something else. He's been working on this project in secret from his family as he didn't want it getting out what he was doing until it was finished.
"Everyone! I just finished my project and it's ready to be tested I just have to run some safety tests and i should be ready to unveil it to the public" john said with excitement in his voice as he went to run his final tests. Later on in the day after he had finished he went and fell asleep in his room with his wife excited to test his device in the morning.

Who uses the device?

Charlie- johns daughter. She doesnt have much interest In what her father worked on but thinks it would be fun to use the new toy she found in the basement. Gets distracted very easily like any child and would probably forget she used the device on someone if she saw a toy or her mom or friend distracted her. Thinks it's fun to have bugs crawl on her and see where they go.
Age- 6

Christie- johns wife. Would be happy to help her husband try his experiment and might try to use it to help with house work or in the bedroom😉.
Age- 25
13.title: Genius inventor

choices: Someone enters the basement and gets hit
133.content: Charlie wakes up early full of energy and wanting to play. She ran to her parents room and saw they were still asleep, she wasn't hungry so she let them sleep and went to go play with her toys. She played for 10 minutes then remembered the new toy her daddy had in the basement and went to go check it out. She entered the basement and walked up to the work bench, pulling over a box to stand on so she could reach, and grabbed the little metal device. She looked it over and wasn't sure what it did but hit a few buttons anyways when...
133.title: Child with the device

1331.content: She fired the device and it hit off of a reflective surface amd bounced back and hit Charlie, she dropped the device back on the table as she shrunk down to 1/2 an inch tall. She looked around and decided it would be fun to explore like this and wanted to play with her now giant toys and made her way to the stairs. As she got close to the she heard movement coming from beyond the massive door that looked far above at the top of the stairs, it sounded like her parents were awake now, though Charlie didn't think about what that would mean for her at her new size.
1331.title: Smaller child

1332.content: As Charlie hit the fire button the device light up and hit her in the chest causing her to drop it back on the work table as she quickly become the last thing scanned into the device
1332.title: Transformed

1333.content: John walks through the door as Charlie fires the device and he gets hit. Charlie looks over to see her dad...
1333.title: Accident

choices: Charlie couldn't decide what to write
13331.content:
Charlie looks over to see her dad but instead sees a bath sponge lying on the floor.

"Daddy? Where are you?" Charlie said as she walks over to where the sponge is.

"Maybe it was my imagination" Charlie picked up the sponge and looked at the device, the device has the word sponge written on the screen.

John could feel the heat and pressure of his daughter's hand, but he had no way to communicate with her, the only thing you could hope for was that Christie realized that you disappeared and saw the manual that you left on the table.

"Sponge? This toy can create things?" Charlie wanted to try it again but ...
13331.title: Transform into something

13332.content:
Charlie looks over to see her dad shrink down to 1cm and walks over to where he was standing and crouches down infront of his diminished form.
"Hehe daddies a little buggy now" Charlie said as she picked up her tiny father.
"Charlie sweety I need you to grow me back" John said as his monolithic daughter plucked him from the ground between her pudgy fingers.
"Your voice is all squeaky daddy" she said as she giggled.
"Charlie come on listen to daddy and grow me back"
"I want to play first I've never gotten to play with you since you've been down here" Charlie said as she bounded up the stairs to her room.
13332.title: Small accident

info.brief_description: A story about transformation and/or shrinking
info.description:
You start as John who exactly he is depends on the story line. He could be a genius inventor or just an unlucky kid that gets caught up in an experiment. All that matters if he gets his hands on a device that can shrink and transform matter in nearly any imaginable way.

Character descriptions

John- average guy nothing particularly special about him (with story exceptions). Lives on his own, moved out when he was 22.
Age(adult line)- 26

Amanda- johns mother. Stay at home mom, she usually spends her days cleaning and doing stuff around the house or with her kids. Looks very well for her age. Wears blouses with jeans or dresses with pantyhose and is usually barefoot, wearing socks or has slippers on around the house.
Age- 47

David- johns father. Works at an office 9-5 Monday-friday job. Wears suits.
Age- 48

Sarah- johns younger sister. Lives with her mom and dad to help with the twins. Wears jean shorts, skirts, and jeans. Works at a diner.
Age- 21

Sam- johns youngest sister and June's twin. Wears dresses and skirts mostly. Plays on the school soccer team.
Age- 14

June- Sam's twin. Wears jeans. Likes to pull pranks on her twin by placing bugs in her hair and clothes. Her room is usually messy. Can't see without her glasses.
Age- 14

More characters can be added just give a small description about them (name, age, a bit about them). If you want to add a picture of them that's fine.

Rules:
1. No suddenly changing a person's personality (dont have a character go from kind to suddenly going to humiliate John for no reason)
2. Keep the continuity. If a character is wearing something in one chapter don't have them suddenly wearing something else out of nowhere, if you want a character to wear something else write that they change.
3. No one sentence chapters (choice chapters are an exception if it only goes 2-3 deep I don't want to go through 30 of them just for it to go nowhere) add at least a paragraph.
4. Have good grammar/spelling. I get that English might not be some peoples first language but please try to make additions readable, just use spell check and make it legible.
5. Dont have any pointless chapters i.e. "what is this story haha" or "that addition sucked" or stuff of the like it just takes up something someone else could have added to and is just plain rude and unneeded.

These next few arent exactly rules but more like requests/preferences:
1. Keep it mostly unaware. John can be seen but make them think hes a bug or just some dirt. You can have people realize it's him but i want this to mostly be an unaware story. People can also know that john/others are shrunk/transformed and help him/them.
2. Underage characters are fine just don't do anything to inappropriate with them.
3. This is a mostly giantess/female story there can be male giants or other males in the story but dont make them the focus. They can interact with john/others while they are shrunk/transformed but don't have it turn into an m/m story.

John can't die the device condenses his molecules to the point were he's pretty much indestructible, he still feels pain but getting stepped on or chewed wont kill him. The device also protects him from stomach acids. When him or someone else is transformed and they're damaged/eaten they can still be turned back, they would just need to be collected if they are in pieces at least up to 80% of them to return to normal or become something else.

I may add more rules if something I didnt think about/ mention on here becomes a problem. But other then that the sky's the limit.

I will try to add at least once every week until this story starts to take off.

Other then that I reserve the right to edit/delete any chapter that violates the rules.
